DOC.brief_summary: Vitamin A metabolite ( retinoids ) show activate brown fat function preclinical study , however role retinoids human brown fat physiology energy metabolism remain elusive . This study aim identify possible association retinoid metabolism , brown fat activity , energy expenditure lean obese subject use FDG-PET-CT , PET-MR Scans indirect calorimetry . Additionally analyze genetic profile white brown neck fat biopsy room temperature cold condition subset study participant . More detailed molecular study ( involve potential browning marker ) also perform adipocytes derive human SVC . The optimal duration cold exposure determine pilot study . Therefore subject repeatedly expose cold circulating retinoid level plasma parameter measure various time point .
DOC.criteria: Age 20 45 year . Body mass index ( BMI ) 18.5 24.9 kg/m2 ( lean ) 30.0 38.0 kg/m2 ( obese ) Endocrine ( except hyperlipidemia ) , cardiovascular ( except hypertension ) , liver , kidney , inflammatory bowel , rheumatic , oncologic disease chronic condition .
